original_text: Then the priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering with his finger and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering and pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the altar.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 속죄제물의 피를 손가락으로 찍어 번제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피는 전부 제단 밑에 쏟고

sentences.original_text: Then the priest shall take some of the blood
of the sin offering with his finger
and put it on the horns of the altar
and pour out the rest of the blood
at the base of the altar
